original_text: Then the Lord’s anger will burn against you, and he will shut up the heavens so that it will not rain and the ground will yield no produce, and you will soon perish from the good land the Lord is giving you.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희에게 진노하사 하늘을 닫아 비를 내리지 아니하여 땅이 소산을 내지 않게 하시므로 너희가 여호와께서 주신 아름다운 땅에서 속히 멸망할까 하노라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord's anger will burn against you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주의 분노가 당신들에게 타오를 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and he will shut up the heavens
so that it will not rain
and the ground will yield no produce,
